org.araneaframework.uilib.form
Class LocalFormElementValidationErrorRenderer

java.lang.Object
  org.araneaframework.uilib.form.LocalFormElementValidationErrorRenderer
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable, FormElementValidationErrorRenderer
public class LocalFormElementValidationErrorRenderer
extends Object
implements FormElementValidationErrorRenderer

Form element validation error renderer, which produces error messages directly attached to rendered FormElements.

Since:
1.1
Author:
Taimo Peelo (taimo@araneaframework.org)
See Also:
Serialized Form

getClientRenderText

public String getClientRenderText(FormElement<?,?> element)
Description copied from interface: FormElementValidationErrorRenderer
Returns client-side script capable of rendering errors in desired format. This should be in a format that can be directly appended to rendered HTML and should be enclosed in HTML <script> tags.

When the errors are rendered with some other mechanism, returns null or an empty String.

Specified by:
getClientRenderText in interface FormElementValidationErrorRenderer
Returns:
script capable of rendering errors in desired format

getMessages

protected static Set<MessageContext.MessageData> getMessages(FormElement<?,?> element)
Retrieves the messages collection for given form element.

Parameters:
element - The form element for which the messages collection should be retrieved.
Returns:
A non-null collection.
Since:
2.0

getFormattedMessage

protected static String getFormattedMessage(String msg)
Formats the given message by escaping it from JavaScript code.

Parameters:
msg - The message to escape.
Returns:
The escaped message that can be used in JavaScript code.
